name: Danganronpa Another Chapter 2-4 English
description:
This is a custom  beta non-official release for chapter 2, 3, and 4 for Danganronpa Another in english.

Translation made by: Zephirum (Chapter 2-3-4) 
and the Danganronpa Another Official Translation Team
(Chapter 2 Dinning  Hall events).

Known issues:

1)Free time events are in Korean.

2) Enviromental objects are in Korean (at least 70% of them)

3)Typos and weird wordings during gameplay.

If you need any help opening this game consider reading this FAQ:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/16Sl4cDD2YKCAmZVutnodop218TeBN5-tdAtV5KbRb5M/edit?usp=drivesdk

English Translated Designs made by:

Zephirum : (Discord Server) https://discord.gg/YRCBakPFPb

Samic : Samic#0559 (Discord)

Game developed by LINUJ.
